O

onActionAddAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.Appointments
This method is called when the user clicks the "Add" button on the Appointments screen.
onActionAddCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.Customers
When the user clicks the "Add Customer" button, switch to the "CustomersAdd.fxml" screen.
onActionAll(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.Appointments
When the "All" radio button is selected, the "Week" and "Month" radio buttons are deselected, and the Appointments list is cleared and repopulated with all appointments from the database.
onActionCancel(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.AppointmentsAdd
It loads the Main Menu scene when the user clicks the Cancel button.
onActionCancel(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.AppointmentsModify
It cancels updating the appointment.
onActionCancel(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.CustomersAdd
This is the method to switch to the Customers screen when the user clicks the Cancel button.
onActionCancel(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.CustomersModify
This function is called when the user clicks the "Cancel" button.
onActionContactCombo(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.Reports
This is the method to display the appointments for the selected contact when the user selects a contact from the contactCombo combo box.
onActionCountryCombo(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.CustomersModify
This method is called when the user selects a country from the country combo box.
onActionCountryCombo(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.Reports
When the user selects a country from the countryCombo, the function gets the countryId of the selected country and passes it to the countCustomers() function in the CustomerDaoImpl class.
OnActionCountryCombo(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.CustomersAdd
This is the method to set the divisionCombo combo box.
onActionDeleteAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.Appointments
Deletes the selected appointment after displaying a confirmation dialog box.
onActionDeleteCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.Customers
If a customer is selected, confirm that the user wants to delete the customer, then if the customer has appointments, confirm that the user wants to delete the appointments, then delete the appointments, then delete the customer
onActionDivisionCombo(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.CustomersAdd
This is the method to set the divisionCombo combo box.
onActionExit(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.Login
This method exits the program.
onActionLogIn(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.Login
This method handles the log in button action event.
onActionLogOut(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.MainMenu
This is the method to load the Login screen when the user clicks the Log Out button.
onActionModifyAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.Appointments
This method handles the action event of the Modify button on the Appointments screen.
onActionModifyCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.Customers
When the user clicks the "Modify Customer" button, switch to the Customers Modify screen.
onActionMonth(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.Appointments
When the month radio button is selected, the other two radio buttons are deselected, the appointments list is cleared, and the appointments list is populated with the appointments for the current month.
onActionMonthCombo(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.Reports
If the user selects a month from the monthCombo, then the function will validate the selection
onActionSave(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.AppointmentsAdd
This method saves a new appointment to the database.
onActionSave(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.AppointmentsModify
This method saves the modified appointment.
onActionSave(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.CustomersAdd
The function checks if the customer information fields are empty, if they are, it will display an error message.
onActionSave(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.CustomersModify
This function is called when the user clicks the "Save" button.
onActionTypeCombo(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.Reports
If the user selects a month and a type, then the function will call the validateSelection function
onActionWeek(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.Appointments
When the user clicks the "Week" radio button, the "All" and "Month" radio buttons are deselected, the Appointments list is cleared, and the Appointments list is populated with the current week's appointments.
